mapper.select: select go_start_tm as repl_start_tm ,go_end_tm as repl_end_tm from ks_daily_rule where getdate() between apply_start_dt and apply_end_dt

select month_replace_count - (select count(distinct repl_dt) from ks_replace where crtd_id=#{crtdId} and convert(varchar(7), repl_dt, 120) =convert(varchar(7), getdate(), 120)) as currCount, max_replace_hr*60 - ISNULL((select sum(term) from ks_replace where crtd_id=#{crtdId} and repl_dt =#{searchDt} group by repl_dt),0) as todayMin, isnull((select convert(varchar(5),max(repl_end_tm),114) from ks_replace where crtd_id=#{crtdId} and repl_dt=#{searchDt}),go_start_tm) as availStartTm from ks_daily_rule where #{searchDt} between apply_start_dt and apply_end_dt
select count(*) from ks_replace where crtd_id=#{crtdId} and repl_dt =#{searchDt}

select id ,convert(varchar(10),repl_dt,120) as repl_dt ,convert(varchar(5),repl_start_tm,114) as repl_start_tm ,convert(varchar(5),repl_end_tm,114) as repl_end_tm ,term ,convert(varchar(10),supple_dt,120) as supple_dt ,memo ,in_lunch ,(select caps_name from ks_user where id=re.crtd_id) as crtd_id ,crtd_dt ,(select caps_name from ks_user where id=re.mdfy_id) as mdfy_id ,mdfy_dt from ks_replace re where id=#{searchId}

select id ,convert(varchar(10),repl_dt,120) as repl_dt ,convert(varchar(5),repl_start_tm,114) as repl_start_tm ,convert(varchar(5),repl_end_tm,114) as repl_end_tm ,term ,convert(varchar(10),supple_dt,120) as supple_dt ,memo ,in_lunch ,(select caps_name from ks_user where id=re.crtd_id) as crtd_id ,crtd_dt ,(select caps_name from ks_user where id=re.mdfy_id) as mdfy_id ,mdfy_dt from ks_replace re where crtd_id=#{crtdId} and (repl_dt between #{fromDate} and #{toDate} or supple_dt between #{fromDate} and #{toDate})
select count(*) from ks_replace where repl_dt=#{replDt} and crtd_id=#{crtdId}
